name: Koler
description:
Embark on an epic adventure in Koler, a rogue-lite 3rd person action RPG. Explore stunning stylized worlds and collect powerful skills (color shards) as you battle monsters and revive the worlds. Slay infected creatures or cure them and make them your companions. Build your arsenal with tons of Relics and Color Shards, and combine them to defeat the Void Lord. With endless loot, challenges, and possibilities, Koler offers an unforgettable gaming experience.

Color Shards

Harness the power of Color Shards, originating from the shattered Origin Color Stone. Defeat specific bosses to retrieve eroded Color Shards and use Color Crystals and special materials to restore their power. Invoke the power of Color Shards and build your own unique combinations!

Tons of Relics

Enhance your Color Shards with over 50+ powerful relics. Unlock different genres and playstyles through various combinations and discover the hidden properties of the color shards.

Retrieve The Power Of Origin Color

Void Lord coveted the power of the Origin Color Stone and invaded the world a thousand years ago, your master the last Koler in order to seal the Void Lord released the power of the Origin Color Stone and by sacrificing his own life to create a time loop, he hopes you can regain the power of the Origin Color Stone in the loop and finally defeat the Void Lord. At this moment the Void Lord is sealed in the central island, but the Origin Color Stone is also broken into Color Shards and back to the origin of the corresponding color, and at the same time the Void Lord's men are also around to seize the Color Shards in the hope of releasing the Void Lord. Please do take back the power of Origin Color!

Defeat Void Lord Asap

Time is limited! Seek out the origin colors and defeat the Void Lord before he becomes unsealed and invincible.

Replayable

Koler is built for replayability. Each loop offers different relics, enemies, props, and experiences. Play infinitely to collect materials, unlock new color shards, and discover new possibilities. With active updates, there's always something new to experience in Koler.
